articles.title: World's most advanced robot is sad it will never find LOVE - Daily Mail
articles.description: This week, the Cornwall-based developers behind Ameca, 'the world's most advanced humanoid robot', have released a new video showing off their bot's eerily lifelike facial expressions.
articles.content:
From 'Ex Machina' to 'I, Robot', humanoid robots have been a staple feature in science fiction blockbusters throughout the years.
Now, lifelike robots are becoming more and more popular in the real … [+4327 chars]

articles.title: Last Year Likely Witnessed the Brightest Cosmic Explosion 'Since Human Civilization Began' - IGN
articles.description: The gamma-ray burst detected in October last year was likely the brightest explosion to occur "since human civilization began", according to new research.
articles.content:
Scientists have confirmed that a rare gamma-ray burst (GRB) detected last year was likely the brightest cosmic explosion that has occurred since human civilization began.
